Heading: Restricted
Note: Distribution by agreement between the parties to the ONIX exchange (this value is provided to cover applications where ONIX content includes material which is not for general distribution)

Heading: Booktrade
Note: Distributors, bookstores, publisher’s own staff etc

Heading: Shopping comparison service
Note: Where a specially formatted description is required for this audience

Heading: Search engine index
Note: Text not intended for display, but may be used (in addition to any less restricted text) for indexing and search
